comments.text:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Open two Firefox Windows
2. On the first one, press Ctrl+O (open file)
3. Change focus to the second one and press F3

What happened:

- The window lost its focus to the search field of the OpenFile dialog


What should have happened:

- The find toolbar should appear in the second window.


This happened to me while using the SQLite Manager add-on (as the first window) and had trouble understanding why searching in firefox was switching to an explorer window. :/

Tested in today's nightly, Thunderbird 8 and Namoroka so it's probably an old bug. I couldn't find any duplicates, though...
